title: [Helden Hall, Locker Annex]
description: Suffused light emanates from a black marble fireplace set against the far wall, supplementing the light streaming through small shuttered windows.  A natural, unobstructed walkway across the white marble floor is created from the curtain to the fireplace by the placement of a deep-seated leather couch and an opposing sturdy table with an assortment of papers scattered upon it.  A glass-fronted display case is set against the wall next to a wall-mounted blackboard and an iron-worked framed picture hangs above depicting beautiful Aelotoi figures, with wings unfurled.

wayto.35998: pull black tome on display case
